CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(EndDate__c), IF(DATEVALUE(StartDate__c) = DATEVALUE(NOW()), ((NOW() - StartDate__c ) * 24 ), 10*( (5*FLOOR((TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(TODAY()-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/9*(MOD((NOW()- DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 21:30:00')), 1))) )) - (5*FLOOR((DATEVALUE(StartDate__c )-DATE(1996,01,01))/7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(StartDate__c)-DATE(1996,01,01), 7) + MIN(1, 24/9*(MOD((StartDate__c - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 21:30:00')), 1))) )) ) ), DurationHours__c + DurationMins__c/60 + DurationSeconds__c/3600 )
CustomField.label: Business Hours Duration
